eu.infomas.dropbox

Class Request.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.infomas.dropbox.Request.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Request

    public static final class Request.Builder
extends Object
    The builder for Request instances. To start building the request, use: 
     Request.Builder builder = Request.withMethod("GET");

    • Method Detail

      • withSchema

        public Request.Builder withSchema(String scheme)
        Specify the scheme (protocol) of the request. This value is optional. If not specified, https is assumed. MalformedURLException.
        Only "http" and "https" are allowed values.

      • withHost

        public Request.Builder withHost(String host)
        Specify the host (server address) of the request endpoint (URL). This value is mandatory.

      • withPort

        public Request.Builder withPort(int port)
        Specify the port of the request endpoint (URL). If not specified, the port number is omitted from the URL.

      • withPath

        public Request.Builder withPath(String path)
        Specify the absolute path of the request endpoint (URL). This value is optional. It specified, the path must be absolute (starting with a "/").

      • withParameter

        public Request.Builder withParameter(String name,
                            Object value)
        Add a query parameter. Note that 'value' is always converted to a String by calling Object.toString(). If the 'value' is null the query parameter is not added to the URL.

      • withHeader

        public Request.Builder withHeader(String name,
                         String value)
        Add a header name-value pair. If 'value' is null the header name-value pair is not added.

      • withPayload

        public Request.Builder withPayload(InputStream payload)
        Specify the payload (request body) data. This is optional.

      • toURL

        public URL toURL()
          throws MalformedURLException
        Return the URL for this request.
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException
